Entries.57877002/f VivienneLK 500/t 1000 1700: continue/43 80/VivienneLK 43 77 2 Jodi 37 82 1 Caroline 38 82 3 farmer 49 80 1/skippable/showFrame VivienneLK 16/textAboveHead Jodi "Really?"/move farmer -5 0 3/emote Caroline 40/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 100/move farmer 0 -2 3/question null "...#What are you up to?#Are you spying on them?"/pause 500/speak VivienneLK "Oh, nothing nefarious, I promise!$4#$b#Just engaging in a favorite past-time of mine. People watching!$1"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/pause 500/move VivienneLK 0 1 1/speak VivienneLK "One of the many curses - or maybe perks - of being an author, is an overactive imagination.#$b#I enjoy observing and trying to work out people stories."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection VivienneLK 2/textAboveHead Caroline "He didn't?!"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection VivienneLK 1/quickQuestion So...#What's my story?#What's her story?#What's your story?(break)pause 50\textAboveHead VivienneLK "Hmmm..."\pause 1000\speak VivienneLK "You were a fae prince, trapped in thrall to a cruel darklord.^You were a fae princess, trapped in thrall to a cruel darklord.#$b#Life was monotonous and wearying, and your hope had faded, draining you of life.$2#$b#Then, a spirit came to you in the night, a being of pure light and dropped a key into your hands. The key to unlock you from your shackles."\switchEvent Vivienne_FantasticalEnd(break)pause 50\textAboveHead VivienneLK "Caroline?"\pause 1000\speak VivienneLK "Hmmm, she's a dryad, an elemental being bound to the forest. Fey and wild, she would dance barefoot in the moonlight, singing.#$b#Until one day, a young man heard her song, followed her and fell irredeemably in love.$1#$b#It took some trickery, a great deal of cunning, and some help from mystical hands, but eventually he captured her heart, and made her his."\switchEvent Vivienne_FantasticalEnd(break)pause 50\textAboveHead VivienneLK "Mine?"\pause 1000\speak VivienneLK "Oh, my tale is most horribly mundane, the sheer pinacle of drudgery.#$b#I'm sure you would find it entirely too dull for words."/Question null "...#I don't believe that!#If you say so."/pause 500/speak VivienneLK "I've found, despite rumors to the opposite, that most times, truth is in fact not stranger than fiction.#$b#It mostly has less serendipitous coincidence and an underwhelming, rather predictable, conclusion.#$b#Disappointing, I know.$2"/pause 500/switchEvent Vivienne_eventEnd
Entries.Vivienne_FantasticalEnd: pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak VivienneLK "So, am I right?"/quickQuestion #Uncannily so!#Sorry, not even close.#Pretty sure that's nonsense.(break)pause 500\emote VivienneLK 20\speak VivienneLK "These eyes might be old, but they can see to the heart of the matter.#$b#There's magic to be found, even in the mundane.$1"(break)pause 500\emote VivienneLK 40\speak VivienneLK "Really? Oh, how disappointing. Still, I'm a storyteller, not a seer."(break)pause 500\emote VivienneLK 60\speak VivienneLK "Of course it is, @. I'm a storyteller, not a seer."/switchEvent Vivienne_eventEnd
Entries.Vivienne_eventEnd: pause 500/faceDirection VivienneLK 2/pause 1000/faceDirection VivienneLK 1/speak VivienneLK "Anyhow, I rather like you, @. I hope that we can become friends."/pause 500/emoet farmer 32/pause 1000/end
